subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets looked no farther than their clubhouse in shoring up second base for next season, re-signing José Valentín to a one-year contract with a vesting option for 2008.
snippet: The Mets looked no farther than their clubhouse in shoring up second base for next season, re-signing José Valentín to a one-year contract with a vesting option for 2008.
